Publication Title: Epigenetic markers and therapeutic targets for metastasis
Publication Keywords: Plasticity, Metastasis, Circulating Tumor Cells, Epigenetic Biomarkers, Epi-drugs
Publication Authors: Carolyn J Kravitz, Qin Yan, Don X Nguyen
Publication Abstract: The last few years have seen an increasing number of discoveries which collectively demonstrate that histone and DNA modifying enzyme modulate different stages of metastasis. Moreover, epigenomic alterations can now be measured at multiple scales of analysis and are detectable in human tumors or liquid biopsies.
